notes.kit: TBD - Will be announced based on opponent kit
notes.coach: SECOND WIN OF THE SEASON last Saturday! Fantastic 4-2 victory over Sheffield United! Niko D converted a penalty with confidence, Adam K scored twice showing smart positioning for follow-ups, and Travis C finished beautifully from Andy E's assist. Andy showed real character - missed a penalty but bounced back to provide the crucial assist. Rafael H hit the post twice, showing we're creating quality chances. Despite wasting many opportunities, the team showed resilience and determination to secure the win. Excellent momentum building! Next match: Saturday Nov 22 at 10:30am vs CMFSC Middlesbrough at Eagle Ridge Park South (AWAY). Let's make it three wins!
notes.training_recap: Training schedule to be announced. Focus on maintaining momentum and capitalizing on chances.
notes.match_update: NEXT MATCH: Saturday Nov 22 at 10:30am vs CMFSC Middlesbrough, Eagle Ridge Park South (AWAY). Training details coming soon.
notes.this_week: Building on our SECOND WIN! Team showing real momentum with clinical finishing and strong character. Let's keep this winning streak going!
